mapper.insert:
select hire_note_seq.nextval from dual
insert into hire_noti(hnNo, hnNotiTitle, cmNo, hnSalStart, hnSalEnd,hnViews,hnStart,hnDeadline, hnHows,hnTask,hnPreference,hnStep,hnBenefits,hnDocument,hnAddr,hnDetailAddr,hnLat,hnLng, hnStatus,hnGender,hnMajor,hnEmpType,hnRank,hnOccupation,hnSectors,hnPosition,hnRecruitNum, eduNo,careerNo) values(#{hnNo}, #{hnNotiTitle}, #{cmNo}, #{hnSalStart}, #{hnSalEnd},#{hnViews},#{hnStart}, #{hnDeadline},#{hnHows},#{hnTask},#{hnPreference},#{hnStep},#{hnBenefits},#{hnDocument}, #{hnAddr},#{hnDetailAddr},#{hnLat},#{hnLng},#{hnStatus},#{hnGender},#{hnMajor}, #{hnEmpType},#{hnRank},#{hnOccupation},#{hnSectors},#{hnPosition},#{hnRecruitNum}, #{eduNo},#{careerNo})
